About Us

We are Students of 5th Semester Computer Department at Graphic Arts Institute.

Graphic Arts Institute is a technology based monotechnic institution in Mohammadpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is directed under The Directorate of Technical Education(DTE). This is the only one government printing based monotechnic institute for diploma in engineering courses in Bangladesh. It provides diploma in engineering program in three technologies, they are 1. Printing Technology, 2. Graphic Design and, 3. Computer Technology.
